org.apache.hadoop.hbase.backup.impl

类 TableBackupClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.backup.impl.TableBackupClient
  • 直接已知子类:
    FullTableBackupClient, IncrementalTableBackupClient

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
public abstract class TableBackupClient
extends Object
    Base class for backup operation. Concrete implementation for full and incremental backup are delegated to corresponding sub-classes: FullTableBackupClient and IncrementalTableBackupClient

        backupInfo - The current backup info
        抛出:
